It was created to help you understand all aspects of company procedures and the benefits of being an EPAM employee. The Handbook covers many topics on which employees frequently have questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Employee Handbook is the main source of company rules and policies, so please make sure you read and understood its contents.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To open the Employee Handbook, go to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/home.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"info.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and in the menu bar choose <Handbook>. The Handbook will automatically open on your
